entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
